snippet.title: While We Wait Here - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
While We Wait Here will launch on October 23rd, 2024. The game will be available on Xbox, PlayStation 4 & 5, Nintendo Switch, and for PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store. The game will be priced at $4.99 and will receive a launch day discount!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2213120/While_We_Wait_Here/
Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011312/
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/while-we-wait-here/9n3vjvmffvfn
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/while-we-wait-here-switch/
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/while-we-wait-here-94fa5d

#WhileWeWaitHere #BadVicesGames #horrorgaming #thrillermovies
